text:
Modus Create | Sr. PHP Engineer | REMOTE | http://bit.ly/2mL4TNc

I have multiple openings for Sr. PHP Engineers with Laravel Framework Experience. The roles can be performed from a remote location but you have to be willing to co-work an average of 5 hours per day w/ GTM -5 time zone. Follow the link http://bit.ly/2mL4TNc to apply or email kristen (at) moduscreate (dot) com w/ questions
